header.description: A passionate <highlightBlue>Frontend Web Developer</highlightBlue> specializing in building fast, responsive, and elegant web applications using <highlight>React.js</highlight> and <highlight>Next.js</highlight> with <highlight>Tailwind CSS</highlight> and modern web tools.

skills.subtitle: Merging technical logic with creative front-end artistry

frontend.title: Frontend

backend.title: Backend
backend.desc: Good understanding of server logic, API design, and databases.

footer.about: I build accessible, performant web experiences focused on React, Next.js, and clean design.

projects.subtitle: A few highlights from my latest work — built with modern web technologies.
